title: Movie Downloader Website
shortDesc: Download and manage your favorite movies with ease using streamfree
longDesc: Built with React js, Tailwind css for the UI, and JSON for data management. Used a Node.js backend to handle movie data and user interactions. The website allows users to search for movies, view details, and download them directly. It also features a user-friendly interface with responsive design for seamless browsing on any device.

title: WEB_PROJ_UNI_RICH_LOOK_HOMEPAGE
shortDesc: This is a homepage for a university project.
longDesc: Just use HTML and CSS to create a homepage for a university project. The design is simple and clean, with a focus on usability and accessibility. The homepage includes a navigation bar, a hero section, and a footer. The navigation bar allows users to easily navigate to different sections of the website, while the hero section provides an overview of the project. The footer includes contact information and links to social media profiles.

title: School_Service_Easir
shortDesc: This ERP system is designed to manage the complexity of handling the School Transport services business. This includes Dashboard, Students' Records and more.
longDesc: I used HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create a user-friendly interface for the ERP system.

title: Agency-Management-System(real world project)
longDesc: Agency management system built with React + Vite and packaged as a desktop app using Electron. It uses SQLite for storage, Tailwind for UI, Recharts for visualizations, jsPDF for PDF exports, React Router for navigation, and Lucide icons. ESLint ensures code quality.
